name: Keepsake
description: Keepsake was a labor of love developed 10 years ago by us as an independent studio. For its anniversary, we thought it would be great to see it live again on steam and gain a new following, as we feel that it is still relevant today.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP Processor: 1 GHZ Memory: 256 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX Compliant Additional Notes: Mouse, Keyboard, Speakers
